content: Electron Microscopy Core (EMC) serves as an important part of the centralized effort in Research Resources Center (RRC) in University of Illinois Chicago (UIC). EMC offers services and training to users across disciplines including both materials science and biological science. Equipped with several cutting-edge instruments such as (S)TEMs, SEMs, FIB, Raman spectroscopy and surface science instrument such as X-ray Photoemission Spectroscopy, we offer users a comprehensive experience to advance their research as well as fostering a collaborative environment with the expertise from our staff members.
